title: fix: OpenClaw branding â€” favicon, logos, fonts
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: OpenClaw receives a visual upgrade with proper pollinations.ai branding, fixed typography, and improved mobile responsiveness.
gist.impact: Users will enjoy a more polished, consistent interface with better readability on mobile devices.
gist.visual_concept: Project: OpenClaw (represented by a crab mascot). Concept: The pollinations.ai bee helping a pixel art crab set up a new sign/logo. The update is about branding/logos, so the characters are admiring a new visual element.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot and a cute 8-bit crab character admiring a new pixelated signboard. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'OpenClaw'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
